description: EEA Geotags package redefines the location field in Plone. Right now in Plone location field is a free text field. EEA Geotags lets you easy define locations using a map picker and httpgeonames.org geographical database.

info.Author:: Alin Voinea (Eaudeweb), Antonio De Marinis (EEA), European Environment Agency (EEA)
info.Keywords:: eea geotags widget field zope plone

longdescription: EEA Geotags package redefines the location field in Plone. Right now in Plone location field is a free text field. EEA Geotags lets you easy define locations using a map picker and httpgeonames.org geographical database.
